overview:
Da Phone is a communications company that specializes in cost efficient international calling. Our unique offerings provide multiple call options for customers: a SIM card for travellers, a . This cutting-edge system is suitable for all existing operating systems in any mobile phone worldwide. Customers are now able to make international calls at the lowest possible rates from 50 countries located worldwide and enjoy talking with absolutely no roaming charges. Additionally, with free incoming calls, our customers are receiving significant extra savings by using Da Phone.

Developed by VoIP and Information System experts, Da Phone operates internationally by providing the most cost-efficient VoIP services possible. Never before have travelers been able to stay in touch so easily. By using Da Phone, there is minimum commitment and payment involved with staying this connected.
